TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpSimpleClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol
Public MustInherit Class HttpSimpleClientProtocol Inherits HttpWebClientProtocol

summary.span: 表示用于使用简单的 HTTP-GET 和 HTTP-POST 协议绑定与 XML Web services 进行通信的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for communicating with an XML Web service using the simple HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST protocols bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类通过使用编码器将参数编码并将值返回到常见 MIME 格式, 来指定用于通过 HTTP 与 XML Web service 进行通信的大部分实现。This class specifies most of the implementation for communicating with an XML Web service over HTTP using encoders to encode the parameters and return values into common MIME formats. 这些编码器派生自类。These encoders derive from the class. 默认情况下, 从使用 application/x-url 编码 MIME 类型的参数和纯 XML 中的响应, 派生的代理类将参数编码。By default, a proxy class deriving from encodes parameters using the application/x-www-form-urlencoded MIME type and the response in plain XML. 可以使用特性指定自定义 mime 格式化程序, 但是, 不支持将其集成到服务说明和代理生成。Custom mime formatters can be specified using the attribute, however, there is no support for integrating this into a service description and proxy generation. `Notes to Inheritors:`重写此类时, 可以在派生类中引入特定于特定类型的 XML Web service 的方法。`Notes to Inheritors:` When you override this class, you can introduce methods in the derived class that are specific to a particular type of an XML Web service. 方法只是捕获参数, 并调用基类来完成与站点的通信工作。The methods simply capture the parameters, and call the base class to do the work of communicating with the site. 如果引入的方法是异步的, 则调用和方法。If the introduced methods are asynchronous, call the and methods. 如果引入的方法是同步的, 请调用方法。If the introduced methods are synchronous, call the method. 重写的构造函数通常将属性设置为 XML Web service 方法的 URI。The overridden constructor typically sets the property to the URI of the XML Web service method. Web 服务描述语言工具 (wsdl.exe) 为给定的服务说明生成的派生类。The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) generates derived classes of for a given Service Description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是由 wsdl.exe 为`Math`以下 XML Web service 生成的代理类。The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service below. 代理类派生自抽象类, 后者派生自抽象类。The proxy class derives from , which derives from the abstract class. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`从其创建前面的代理类的 XML Web service。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

protected: IAsyncResult ^ BeginInvoke(System::String ^ methodName, System::String ^ requestUrl, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ parameters, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ asyncState);
member this.BeginInvoke : string * string * obj[] * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.span: 创建 时要使用的 URL。

param.span: 一个对象数组，包含要传递到 XML Web services 方法的参数。

span.span: The order of the values in the array corresponds to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.

param.name: callback
param.span: 异步方法调用完成时要调用的委托。

span.span: The delegate to call when the asynchronous method call is complete.

param.span: 如果 为 ，则不调用委托。

param.span: 客户端提供的其他信息。

span.span: The additional information supplied by a client.

summary.span: 开始异步调用 XML Web services 的方法。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous invocation of a method of an XML Web service.

returns.span: 一个 ，它可以传递到 方法以从 XML Web services 方法中获取返回值。

span.span: An that can be passed to the method to obtain the return values from the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数用于查找调用方法的方法的参数类型和返回值。 `methodName`The `methodName` parameter is used to find the types of the parameters and return values of the method that is invoking the method. 它还用于查找可能已添加到方法中的自定义属性。It is also used to find custom attributes that may have been added to the method. 、 和提供有关 HTTP 协议所需的派生方法的其他信息。, , and provide additional information on the derived method that is required for the HTTP protocol. `asyncState`传入`callback` , 并且包含在从方法返回的中。`asyncState` is passed into `callback` and is included in the that is returned from the method. 此方法可用于将异步调用上下文中的信息传递给中`callback`的异步结果处理。It is useful for passing information from the context of the asynchronous call to the handling of the asynchronous result in `callback`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体, 它调用名为`Math`的 XML Web service。The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在函数中, Web 窗体启动并完成`Add` XML Web service 方法的异步调用。 `EnterBtn_Click`Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form starts and completes an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (wsdl.exe) 为`Math`以下 XML Web service 生成的代理类。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below. 在 proxy 类的 `Add`方法中, 方法启动 XML Web service 方法的异步调用。 `BeginAdd`Within the `BeginAdd` method of the proxy class, the method starts an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`从其创建前面的代理类的 XML Web service。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

span.span: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体, 它调用名为`Math`的 XML Web service。The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在函数中, Web 窗体启动并完成`Add` XML Web service 方法的异步调用。 `EnterBtn_Click`Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form starts and completes an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (wsdl.exe) 为`Math`以下 XML Web service 生成的代理类。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below. 在 proxy 类的 `Add`方法中, 方法启动 XML Web service 方法的异步调用。 `EndAdd`Within the `EndAdd` method of the proxy class, the method starts an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例是`Math` XML Web service, 其中创建了上面的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the above proxy class was created. protected: System::Object ^ Invoke(System::String ^ methodName, System::String ^ requestUrl, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ parameters);
member this.Invoke : string * string * obj[] -> obj

param.name: methodName
param.span: 正调用 方法的派生类中的 XML Web services 方法的名称。

span.span: The name of the XML Web service method in the derived class that is invoking the method.

param.name: requestUrl
param.span: 客户端正在请求的 XML Web services 方法的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the XML Web service method that the client is requesting.

param.name: parameters
param.span: 一个对象数组，包含要传递到远程 XML Web services 的参数。

span.span: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the remote XML Web service.

param.span: 数组中值的顺序与派生类的调用方法中的参数顺序对应。

span.span: The order of the values in the array corresponds to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.

summary.span: 使用 HTTP 调用 XML Web services 方法。

span.span: Invokes an XML Web service method using HTTP.

returns.span: 包含派生类方法的返回值、所有引用或 参数的对象数组。

span.span: An array of objects containing the return value and any by-reference or parameters of the derived class method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数用于查找调用方法的方法的参数类型和返回值。 `methodName`The `methodName` parameter is used to find the types of the parameters and return values of the method that is invoking the method. 它还用于查找可能已添加到方法中的自定义属性。It is also used to find custom attributes which may have been added to the method. 和提供有关 SOAP 协议所需的派生方法的其他信息。 and provide additional information on the derived method that is required for the SOAP protocol. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体, 它调用名为`Math`的 XML Web service。The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在函数中, Web 窗体同步`Add`调用 XML Web service 方法。 `EnterBtn_Click`Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form synchronously invokes the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-csharp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#2)] 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (wsdl.exe) 为`Math`以下 XML Web service 生成的代理类。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below. 在 proxy 类的 `Add`方法中, 方法同步调用 Web 服务方法。 `Add`Within the `Add` method of the proxy class, the method synchronously invokes the `Add` Web Service method. [!code-cpp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math` XML Web service, 其中创建了上面的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the above proxy class was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]
